title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so. The item does not get highlighted or selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that the item should be selectable and get highlighted when clicked for the first time in the library outline view.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label or any other item in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label or any other item for the first time.
